oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: T. Texas Tyler - Live At The Riverside Rancho - 1950-01-11 - NBC
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: T. Texas Tyler (host/performer) and his Western Dance Band (performers) and Arch Presby (announcer) live performance at the Riverside Rancho, Los Angeles for NBC on January 11, 1950.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: T. Texas Tyler; Tex Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Remember Me (T. Texas Tyler and his Western Dance Band) -- Opening statement (Arch Presby) -- T. Texas Tyler talks and introduces Tex Williams -- Tex Williams talks and wishes T. Texas Tyler good luck -- T. Texas Tyler talks and introduces the next tune -- Jessie Polka (T. Texas Tyler and his Western Dance band) -- I Love You Because (T. Texas Tyler and his Western Dance Band) -- T. Texas Tyler talks and mentions upcoming guests -- [Unidentified tune] -- Tyler talks -- Teardrops In My Heart (T. Texas Tyler and his Western Dance Band) -- Tyler talks -- [Unidentified tune] -- Tyler talks and introduces the next tune -- Goodnight Waltz (T. Texas Tyler and his Western Dance Band) -- Tyler talks and introduces the next tune -- Ida Red (T. Texas Tyler and his Western Dance Band) -- Closing statements (Arch Presby and T. Texas Tyler)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tyler, T. Texas; Williams, Tex;
